-LwPj52B6TCD_A76eN2B.message: YOURI!!! Thanks for being amazing the past year, visiting Paris with me, and being my Slack/What's App/ Instagram friend. Let's hang when I'm in Toronto next. I'LL MISS YOUUOUOU!!! #cocochanel
